subSubSection.paragraph:
Type host:
Columba livia domestica Gmelin, 1789
.

Chilean localities: Santiago : Region RM ; Talagante: Region RM ; Valparaíso : Region V ; Ñuble: Region XVI
.
Geographic distribution: All continents, except Antarctica .

Chilean references:
González-Acuña et al . (2008a)
; Moreno & González-Acuña (2015) ; González-Acuña & Moreno (2018) ;
Grandón-Ojeda et al. (2019)
.

Remarks:
Colpocephalum turbinatum
is exceptional among lice because of its wide range of host associations, including many species of pigeons, eagles, hawks, harriers, vultures, osprey and owls (see
Price et al . 2003: 102
).
